artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Daikokuya Kichinosuke
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 62; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 304.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: male figure with head to R in triangular cartouche, framed with wreath; yellow glass wind chime with paper hanging from wreath; bamboo in lower background; white robe with dark blue swirls
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳桐 {Yoshikiri} | Censor seal: 戌五改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Recollections of Fashionable Actors (Fūga wazaogi shinobu 風哥俳優志野婦)
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
title: Actor Nakamura Shikan IV
